name: Utopia: BGP Remake
description:
Gameplay:

View the complete instructions for Utopia in-game by pressing the 1 Key

  • Out-civilize your opponent!
  • Use your time in office to build onto your island and make its inhabitants happy

What is New:

  • New Sprites
  • New Interface: Displays Gold, Happiness, Population and Resources to both players at all times
  • Larger Islands to support longer play sessions
  • Number of Rounds and Term of Office can be set to 999, making the longest possible game you can play a total of 277.225 hours.

More Games by Bluish-Green Productions

Original game created by Mattel, (c) 1981, 1997 Intellivision Productions, Inc.

Design, program: Don Daglow

Graphics: Kai Tran, Don Daglow

Sound: Russ Lieblich (sound effects used in the game are from the original)
